Applications.title: Funeral Staff
Applications.description: Help Funeral Directors, Help Manage Funerals, and assist where needed.
questions: What is your DISCORD username? (Your USERNAME, NOT Displayname)
What is your ROBLOX username? (Your USERNAME, NOT Displayname)
Do you have any previous Funeral Staffing experience?
Why do you want to be Funeral Staff for BFH?
How long have you been playing Bloxburg?
Are you familiar with the basics of Bloxburg?
Do you understand asking about the status of your Application will result in the immediate denial of it?
Do you understand you will have to go through training, and proper licensing before being able to staff at services?
Do you understand that recieving a total of 3 Write Ups will result in your Termination from the Staff Team?
Do you understand that you will always respect your higher ups?
Do you think you have tried your best on this Application and are ready to submit?
Any Notes you would like to add?
